akn:section.akn:heading: Advance payments for computer programing services

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 6619. Advance payments for computer programing services Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate, subject to the approval of the Committee on Rules and Administration, is on and after July 6, 1981, authorized to enter into contracts which provide for the making of advance payments for computer programing services. (Pub. L. 97–20, July 6, 1981, 95 Stat. 104.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was formerly classified to section 123c–1 of this title prior to editorial reclassification and renumbering as this section.
